channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-1955] When starting Hbase cluster,
item.description:
When i start up HBase cluster, master logs shows zookeeper complaining about being in safe-mode. Manually deleting the safe-mode file from zk using hbase shell, the WARN logs disappear:

shell> zk 'delete /hbase/safe-mode'

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: We don't have a safe-mode anymore. Resolving as invalid.
